_header: Let us advise this day primordial
_description: A paraphrase of the hymn, ‘Primo dierum omnium’ — nine stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Lat vs avvise thys dey primordiallThys primer day os scripture doth
                    devisse…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…In oone substance personys triplitateAll thre in oone beyng
                    essenciate. Amene.
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 468-71.
